{{Quote|The Hornfoots have it easy in the mountains. The cold so hardens and blackens the soles of their feet that they don't even need boots.|[[Tormund]]|The Nations of the North}} 
The '''Hornfoot''' are a clan of [[Free Folk]].

The Hornfoots live in the foothills of the [[Frostfangs]], far away from the coasts.  The hard rocky terrain in the mountains hardens and blackens their feet until it is as tough as leather, and they do not need boots.<ref>[[The Nations of the North]]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Hornfoot are known for wearing nothing on their feet, even in the sub-arctic snows of the lands beyond the Wall, which turns their soles as hard as boiled leather. They are enemies of the Nightrunners.
